summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Transformer Test Report feature including form UI, API endpoints, and PDF generation. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: TransformerTestReport.js is well-structured with all 10+ sections as specified
Report number format correctly updated to ENERZIA/TRN/YEAR/NUMBER
PDF generation using ReportLab works correctly with all sections
OLTC toggle correctly shows/hides OLTC-related sections
Form has proper data-testid attribute for testing
All form fields have proper validation and default values
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up UI_TEST_Customer and TEST_Customer reports during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Transformer Test Report feature fully implemented. Form at /projects/project-reports/equipment/transformer/new with comprehensive sections. PDF generation at /api/transformer-report/{id}/pdf. Report number format: ENERZIA/TRN/YEAR/NUMBER.

transformer_form_navigation.details: New Report button on transformer list navigates to /projects/project-reports/equipment/transformer/new

form_sections_present.details: All 13 sections verified: Report Information, Customer Information, Service Provider Details, Main Equipment Details, Maintenance Checklist, Test Instruments Used, TEST 1 (Oil BDV), TEST 2 (IR Test), TEST 3 (Magnetic Balance), TEST 6 (Vector Group), OLTC toggle, Results, Signatures

report_number_format.details: New reports created with format ENERZIA/TRN/YEAR/NUMBER (e.g., ENERZIA/TRN/2026/0001)

form_submission.details: Save Draft and Complete Report buttons work correctly, redirects to list after save

pdf_generation.details: PDF download button works, generates valid PDF file with correct filename

transformer_reports_list.details: List page shows all transformer reports with View, Edit, Download actions

oltc_toggle.details: OLTC checkbox found, toggles OLTC-related sections visibility

api_crud_operations.details: All 11 pytest tests passed - create, read, update, delete, PDF generation
